text:
@realDonaldTrump @FoxNews So what you want a medal Mr President. 120,000 Americans died and heaps infected with Covid19 and you are making jokes about SLOWING TESTING. That comment made you look stupid and The Republican Party look terrible. Pull your head out of your butt and DO
YOUR JOB PERIOD
